attributes.action: Abolish the weekly tiny food waste bins and go back to normal food waste bins
attributes.additional_details: The small weekly doorstep food waste bins are not enough for people to store their waste especially for a household of more than 5 people
attributes.background: Please bring back the normal high bins for weekly waste

rejection.details:
You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
